text: Pseudogekko brevipes, Luzon false gecko or orange-spotted smooth-scaled gecko is a species of geckos. It is endemic to central Philippines, where it is found on several islands in dipterocarp and submontane forest at elevations of 300 to 1100 m above sea level. == References == Category:Pseudogekko Category:Reptiles described in 1867 Category:Reptiles of the Philippines
title: Pseudogekko brevipes
